name: Trial of the DraGun
description:
Battle against a big dragon with big guns: the DraGun!

Will the DraGun squash you with its gargantuan might or will your unshakable will prevail?  From here on, your guns will do the talking!

Controls

-Move around using the arrows

-Shoot with [W] or [Z] (Protip: you can hold the button)

Credits

-All music and sound effects were free assets on the Unity asset store

(The music was made by TFSui. Go check his work, it's great)

-All programing and art were done by me
